poem:
### Post Office Echoes

Lint and letters, loss and lies,
Horizon shadows, truth that dies.
Silenced voices, verdicts fall,
Stamps and sorrow, echoing hall.
Ministers mumble, justice stained,
Hope in parcels, always feigned.
Caught in numbers, webs so wide,
Postscript: promises denied.
